essential_properties.name: externalId
essential_properties.description: The field to check to see if the lead already exists. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

essential_properties.name: externalIdValue
essential_properties.description: If this value exists in the 'match against' field, update the lead. Otherwise create a new one.

essential_properties.name: company
essential_properties.description: Company of the lead. If person account record types have been enabled, and if the value of Company is null, the lead converts to a person account.

essential_properties.name: lastname
essential_properties.description: Required. Last name of the lead. Limited to 80 characters.

essential_properties.name: leadId
essential_properties.description: ID of Lead that needs to be fetched

essential_properties.name: leadId
essential_properties.description: ID of Lead that needs to be fetched

essential_properties.name: leadId
essential_properties.description: ID of Lead that needs to be fetched

essential_properties.name: leadId
essential_properties.description: ID of contact that needs to be fetched

common_operations.name: Create or Update
common_operations.description: Create a new lead, or update the current one if it already exists (upsert)
